course_title: Special Topics in Physics: General Relativity
class_notes:
Special Topic: General Relativity


Required Prerequisites of PHYS 253 (or PHYS_OX 253Q) and MATH 211 (MATH_OX) 211)
course_description: Offered as required. Credit, two to four hours. Prerequisite: consent of instructor.Selected topics and problems of special or current interest in physics. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
schedule_location: TTh 4pm-5:15pm in Math & Science Center - N302
